An Epode to his worthy friend, Mr. John Dryden to advise him not to answer two malicious pamphlets against his tragedy called, The Duke of Guise. Dryden, John, 1631-1700.
1 sheet ([2] p.)
Printed by J. Grantham, London : 1683.
In verse.
